# RandomForest

```{r}
library(randomForest)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
samp <- createDataPartition(iris$Species, p=0.7, list=F)
data.train <- iris[samp,]
data.test <- iris[-samp,]
```

```{r}
x <- subset(data.test, select = -Species)
y <- data.test$Species
```

```{r}
rf <- randomForest(Species ~ ., data = data.train, ntree = 100)
```

```{r}
pred <- predict(rf, x)
```

```{r}
mean(pred == y) * 100
table(pred, y)
```
